content:
• Tuesday, September 27, 2011
  • SD

    SandRidge Energy (NYSE:SD) agrees to sell four of its East Texas natural gas properties to NFR...

    SandRidge Energy (NYSE:SD) agrees to sell four of its East Texas natural gas properties to NFR Energy LLC for $231M. The company plans to use the proceeds to fund its transition to an oil-focused drilling program. Shares +2.5% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:08 PM | 2 Comments

  • Transcept Pharmaceuticals says it's resubmitted a New Drug Application for Intermezzo to the...

    Transcept Pharmaceuticals says it's resubmitted a New Drug Application for Intermezzo to the FDA. The resubmission follows a meeting between Transcept and the FDA on September 14 to discuss issues raised by the FDA in the July 2011 Complete Response Letter. Shares +3.8% AH.
     
     
     
     
    | 5:59 PM
  • PRGS

    Progress Software (NASDAQ:PRGS) is down 9.8% AH after reporting FQ3 results. While revenue of...

    Progress Software (NASDAQ:PRGS) is down 9.8% AH after reporting FQ3 results. While revenue of $128.4M (down $0.4M Y/Y) and EPS of $0.31 beat consensus by $0.3M and $0.02, the company is guiding for FQ4 revenue of $130M-$134M and EPS of $0.30-$0.33, well below a consensus of $145.4M and $0.42. Progress had already warned earlier this month.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:22 PM
  • CMTL

    Comtech (NASDAQ:CMTL) FQ4 earnings beat on a per share basis, but revenues were just shy of...

    Comtech (NASDAQ:CMTL) FQ4 earnings beat on a per share basis, but revenues were just shy of estimates due to lower sales in its mobile data communications unit. The company raises guidance for 2012, now saying its EPS will be in the range of $1.20-$1.32 on revenues of $400M-$450M, versus estimates for an EPS of $1.08 and revenues of $398M. Separately, the company raises its dividend by 10% and bumps up its stock buyback to $250M. Shares +2.3% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:17 PM
  • ACN

    Accenture (NYSE:ACN) is now up 4% AH following its FQ4 results. Investors seem pleased with the...

    Accenture (NYSE:ACN) is now up 4% AH following its FQ4 results. Investors seem pleased with the company's FY12 EPS guidance of $3.80-$3.88, above a $3.78 consensus. They might also be happy with a 50% boost in the company's semi-annual dividend to $0.675/share, which raises Accenture's yield to 2.7%.
     
     
     
     
    | 5:08 PM
  • ACTS

    China's Actions Semiconductor (NASDAQ:ACTS), a designer of chips for consumer electronics...

    China's Actions Semiconductor (NASDAQ:ACTS), a designer of chips for consumer electronics devices, gains 11.8% AH after lifting its Q3 outlook. The company now expects revenue of $15M-$15.5M, above prior guidance of $12M-$13M, owing to stronger-than-expected demand from the automotive, boombox, and portable media player markets.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:49 PM
  • SMSC

    Standard Microsystems (NASDAQ:SMSC) falls 9.8% AH after reporting FQ2 results. While revenue of...

    Standard Microsystems (NASDAQ:SMSC) falls 9.8% AH after reporting FQ2 results. While revenue of $112.6M (+8% Y/Y) was in-line and EPS of $0.36 only missed by a penny, the company is guiding for FQ3 revenue of $105M-$110M and EPS of $0.30-$0.37, below a consensus of $117.2M and $0.45. Weak PC and consumer electronics chip sales are blamed for the revenue decline.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:32 PM
  • PAYX

    More on Paychex's (NASDAQ:PAYX) FQ1 report: Payroll service revenue improved 6% to $382M, while...

    More on Paychex's (NASDAQ:PAYX) FQ1 report: Payroll service revenue improved 6% to $382M, while Human Resource Services revenue gained 17% to $170M. Reiterates previous FY12 guidance - seeing total service revenue adding 7%-9%, and net income in a range of 5%-7%. Shares +3% AH. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 4:30 PM

  • Stocks are leaking oil into the close, the DJIA up just 1.0% after being nearly 3% higher earlier.

    Stocks are leaking oil into the close, the DJIA up just 1.0% after being nearly 3% higher earlier.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:53 PM | 1 Comment
  • DFS

    Discover (DFS -6%) is off sharply on no particular news. The stock has had a nice run,...

    Discover (DFS -6%) is off sharply on no particular news. The stock has had a nice run, outperforming by a wide berth other credit card issuers as well as the rest of the financial sector. The company blew away earnings estimates late last week as well, so perhaps investors are taking profits.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:50 PM | 2 Comments
  • DELL-OLD

    Dell (DELL-OLD) gains 3.2% after Whitney Tilson declares the IT giant to be his 5th-largest...

    Dell (DELL-OLD) gains 3.2% after Whitney Tilson declares the IT giant to be his 5th-largest position. Tilson's presentation on Dell touts the company's rising free cash flow, diversification, low valuation, and aggressive stock buybacks. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 3:42 PM | 1 Comment
  • HPQ

    Hewlett-Packard (HPQ +4.4%) takes an unfamiliar spot at the top of Dow after getting some love...

    Hewlett-Packard (HPQ +4.4%) takes an unfamiliar spot at the top of Dow after getting some love from Bernstein's Toni Sacconaghi, who says H-P is the first tech stock with a $5B-plus market cap trading at less than 5.5x earnings in the last 20 years. H-P is poised to increase EPS by 6% this year, he reminds, and remains dominant in x86 servers, printers and personal computers.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:41 PM
  • CYTK

    Cytokinetics (CYTK +9%) trades higher late in the day after it says pre-clinical research...

    Cytokinetics (CYTK +9%) trades higher late in the day after it says pre-clinical research relating to its program directed to the inhibition of smooth muscle myosin as a therapeutic approach for the potential treatment of hypertension has been published in the October issue of The Journal of Pharmacology and Experimental Therapeutics.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:24 PM
  • RECN

    Resources Connection (RECN +8.4%) gets a pop today after S&P announces it's being added to...

    Resources Connection (RECN +8.4%) gets a pop today after S&P announces it's being added to the S&P SmallCap 600 Index. The change will occur after the close of trading on Friday, September 30.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:17 PM
  • SBGL

    Though a number of miners are outperforming today, platinum and palladium miners are doing...

    Though a number of miners are outperforming today, platinum and palladium miners are doing especially well. Stillwater Mining (SWC +15.2%) leads the pack following the cancellation of a debt offering, but North American Palladium (PAL +10.2%) and Platinum Group Metals (PLG +12.8%) are also up strongly.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:10 PM | 1 Comment
  • CAC

    Camden National (NASDAQ:CAC) gains 5% after the firm's board approves a plan to purchase 500K...

    Camden National (NASDAQ:CAC) gains 5% after the firm's board approves a plan to purchase 500K shares over the next year, a total repping 6.5% of all the company's outstanding shares.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:09 PM
  • MS

    More Whitney: She cuts her Q3 estimate for Morgan Stanley (NYSE:MS) to $0.28 from $0.53 and...

    More Whitney: She cuts her Q3 estimate for Morgan Stanley (NYSE:MS) to $0.28 from $0.53 and consensus $0.37. She brings down FY12 to $2.14 from $2.50 and against consensus of $2.48. Again, Barclays remains the lowball, seeing a Q3 of just $0.12.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:01 PM
  • DLTR

    Dollar Tree (NASDAQ:DLTR) falls off 1.1%, after initially getting a boost when Morgan Stanley...

    Dollar Tree (NASDAQ:DLTR) falls off 1.1%, after initially getting a boost when Morgan Stanley raised its price target on shares to $86.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:01 PM
  • AEPI

    Plastics packaging company AEP Industries (AEPI +2.5%) agrees to buy privately held Webster...

    Plastics packaging company AEP Industries (AEPI +2.5%) agrees to buy privately held Webster Industries for roughly $28M in cash, giving it access to new markets.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:01 PM
  • MLCO

    Macau casino operator Melco Crown Entertainment (MPEL) is up 8.4%. Shares could be getting a...

    Macau casino operator Melco Crown Entertainment (MPEL) is up 8.4%. Shares could be getting a boost from a Deutsche Bank report claiming Macau's gaming industry is posting a strong September. Other casino operators with Macau exposure are also performing well: LVS +4.4%. WYNN +4%. MGM +3.2%.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:59 PM
  • GS

    CNBC reports Meredith Whitney slashing her Q3 EPS estimate for Goldman Sachs (NYSE:GS) to $0.31...

    CNBC reports Meredith Whitney slashing her Q3 EPS estimate for Goldman Sachs (NYSE:GS) to $0.31 from $3.39 and consensus of $1.13. She lowers her FY12 estimate to $7.85 from $15.30 and against consensus of $15.09. Just last week Barclays said it expects Goldman to report a loss in Q3.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:54 PM | 6 Comments
  • COMV

    Comverge (COMV -1.9%) trades lower after being cut to neutral at Macquarie on weak industry...

    Comverge (COMV -1.9%) trades lower after being cut to neutral at Macquarie on weak industry fundamentals, an anticipated capital raising, and a lack of overall catalysts.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:29 PM
  • GD

    General Dynamics (GD +3.8%) pops after saying its Bath Iron Works subsidiary has been awarded a...

    General Dynamics (GD +3.8%) pops after saying its Bath Iron Works subsidiary has been awarded a $680M contract to build DDG 115, a DDG 51-class guided-missile destroyer, with a $665M option to build a fourth ship. Delivery is scheduled for 2016.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:03 PM
  • EXM

    Shipping stocks soar after global demand for dry-bulk shipping picks up and pushes vessel rates...

    Shipping stocks soar after global demand for dry-bulk shipping picks up and pushes vessel rates higher. Cantor Fitzgerald's shipping analyst chips in, saying a good tape and a strong Baltic Cape Index are supporting the rally. Gainers: EXM +12.4%, DRYS +4.2%, GNK +6.8%, PRGN +8%.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:55 PM | 4 Comments
  • BTU

    Peabody Energy (BTU +4.6%) says it's expanding its COALTRADE platform by opening a new coal...

    Peabody Energy (BTU +4.6%) says it's expanding its COALTRADE platform by opening a new coal trading office in Essen, Germany, one of the most active and liquid coal markets in Europe.  

     
     
     
     
    | 1:53 PM
  • SHLDQ

    Shares of Sears Holdings (SHLD) rally 12% - leading all stocks in the S&P 500 - as reports...

    Shares of Sears Holdings (SHLD) rally 12% - leading all stocks in the S&P 500 - as reports (I , II) begin to emerge saying that the company will begin to lease empty real estate holdings it owns to other retailers.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:44 PM | 2 Comments
  • TTHI

    Microcap drug developer Transition Therapeutics (TTHI +10.3%) gets a boost after publishing...

    Microcap drug developer Transition Therapeutics (TTHI +10.3%) gets a boost after publishing Phase 2 clinical study data for its experimental Alzheimer's drug in the peer-reviewed journal, Neurology.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:42 PM
  • RCM

    Accretive Health (AH +4.1%) outperforms after UBS starts the company at Outperoform. The firm...

    Accretive Health (AH +4.1%) outperforms after UBS starts the company at Outperoform. The firm touts the ability of Accretive's revenue management services to improve hospital margins, and sees its penetration rate rising to 5% by 2014, from a current 2%. UBS also believes new services offerings are ramping ahead of expectations.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:35 PM
  • UNTK

    Unitek Global Services (UNTK +15%) jumps after being initiated at Wunderlich with a buy, calling...

    Unitek Global Services (UNTK +15%) jumps after being initiated at Wunderlich with a buy, calling it an infrastructure play similar to MasTec (MTZ +3.5%) as it was five or six years ago. Wunderlich says the company has "a national presence, a unique shared services model, an excellent reputation, experienced management team, and over 5,000 employees."

     
     
     
     
    | 1:26 PM
  • TRQ

    In addition to Credit Suisse's upgrade, Ivanhoe Mines (IVN +22.8%) is gaining on news of Rio...

    In addition to Credit Suisse's upgrade, Ivanhoe Mines (IVN +22.8%) is gaining on news of Rio Tinto (NYSE:RIO) upping its stake in the company by another 0.5%, to 49%. The move brings Rio's stake in Ivanhoe to the maximum allowed by a December agreement between the companies, though speculation exists Rio may buy Ivanhoe outright.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:23 PM | 1 Comment
  • MS

    Financial stocks (XLF +2.6%) pick up where they left off yesterday, up ~8% since hitting...

    Financial stocks (XLF +2.6%) pick up where they left off yesterday, up ~8% since hitting multiyear lows on Thursday, encouraged by hopes that European officials will provide capital to institutions exposed to a Greek default. Also likely helping is a rotation by fund managers into the sector after ranking among the biggest underperformers in Q3. MS +4.8%, C +4%, JPM +2.4%.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:16 PM
  • AVAV

    AeroVironment (AVAV +4.6%) is trading higher after winning an order from the U.S. Air Force for...

    AeroVironment (AVAV +4.6%) is trading higher after winning an order from the U.S. Air Force for its Raven unmanned aircraft systems under an existing contract with the U.S. Army, worth $6.9M. The system will be used to enhance security at military bases worldwide.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:15 PM
  • SBSAA

    Microcap media stocks are on a tear today, after hopes for European debt resolution lifts the...

    Microcap media stocks are on a tear today, after hopes for European debt resolution lifts the veil off the sector and M&A chatter kicks up. Gainers: SBSA +17%, EMMS +11.5%, ETM +8.7%, CMLS +6.3%.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:08 PM
  • RUSHA

    Commercial truck dealer Rush Enterprises (RUSHA +3.6%) trades higher after Morgan Keegan ups the...

    Commercial truck dealer Rush Enterprises (RUSHA +3.6%) trades higher after Morgan Keegan ups the shares to outperform, saying the company will benefit from an aging industry truck fleet and the early stages of a multi-year truck sales cycle.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:03 PM
  • AM-OLD

    Shares of American Greetings (NYSE:AM-OLD) fall 5.7% after the firm reports a FQ2 earnings beat...

    Shares of American Greetings (NYSE:AM-OLD) fall 5.7% after the firm reports a FQ2 earnings beat of $0.10 on revenue of $369M (+8%), but investors home in on the company's "cautious" outlook for the rest of the year.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:58 PM
  • NTR

    Potash (POT +4.9%) gains after Atlantic Equities ups the shares to overweight, citing lower...

    Potash (POT +4.9%) gains after Atlantic Equities ups the shares to overweight, citing lower relative earnings risk and potential upside from pricing and volumes.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:32 PM
  • BG

    Bunge (BG +7.3%) pops after Citi ups it to a speculative buy on valuation, noting the stock is...

    Bunge (BG +7.3%) pops after Citi ups it to a speculative buy on valuation, noting the stock is trading below book value, and the macro environment is currently favorable for agriculture shares.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:06 PM
  • FCX

    Copper futures bounce 5%, on the turnaround in attitude over Europe: "A few days ago, we were...

    Copper futures bounce 5%, on the turnaround in attitude over Europe: "A few days ago, we were really worried that... officials [were] not willing to do anything" to prop up the economy, a top commodity strategist says. "Now there's optimism that they are willing to do something." Copper was also due for a bounce after falling 22% this month through Monday. FCX +5.1%.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:02 PM | 1 Comment
  • VRSN

    VeriSign (VRSN +3.2%) trades higher after announcing the appointment of its controller John...

    VeriSign (VRSN +3.2%) trades higher after announcing the appointment of its controller John Calys as interim CFO. Calys replaces Brian Robins, who resigned earlier this month to pursue new opportunities.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:54 AM
  • CALX

    Calix (CALX -10.4%) nosedives after the maker of broadband infrastructure gear forecasts Q3...

    Calix (CALX -10.4%) nosedives after the maker of broadband infrastructure gear forecasts Q3 revenue of $83M-$85M and EPS of $0.07-$0.09, well below prior guidance of $104M and $0.20. Calix blames a weak economy, fiber shortages, and delays in federal stimulus payouts related to broadband investments.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:53 AM
  • CI

    HealthSpring (NYSE:HS) registers a 4.5% gain, paying little mind to the decision of its CEO to...

    HealthSpring (NYSE:HS) registers a 4.5% gain, paying little mind to the decision of its CEO to unload shares.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:50 AM | 1 Comment
  • BB

    Research In Motion (RIMM +5.6%) maintains its Carl Icahn rumor-induced gains - still unconfirmed...

    Research In Motion (RIMM +5.6%) maintains its Carl Icahn rumor-induced gains - still unconfirmed - but blistering analysis of the company continues, the latest from Northern Securities: "The situation has become dire as management has embarked on a series of mistimed transitionary steps... We expect the situation to get worse before any potential turnaround."
     
     
     
     
    | 11:44 AM
  • IOC

    InterOil (IOC -10.4%) trades lower after Papua New Guinea's Energy & Petroleum Minister...

    InterOil (IOC -10.4%) trades lower after Papua New Guinea's Energy & Petroleum Minister calls for the company to revise a $6B natural gas project, stating the project is different from the one it approved. InterOil has released a statement claiming its project is in line with the original agreement for it. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 11:24 AM
  • BAX

    Baxter (BAX +5.1%) gains after JP Morgan raises it to overweight, citing a solid product...

    Baxter (BAX +5.1%) gains after JP Morgan raises it to overweight, citing a solid product pipeline and the potential for revenue and EPS growth through 2013.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:23 AM
  • LZB

    Shares of La-Z-Boy (LZB +9.7%) rocket, threatening to set a 2-month high. The firm looks to cash...

    Shares of La-Z-Boy (LZB +9.7%) rocket, threatening to set a 2-month high. The firm looks to cash in with sports-crazed consumers as it launches a new line of recliners emblazened with logos and mascots from their favorite football, baseball, hockey and basketball teams.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:21 AM | 1 Comment
  • LYB

    LyondellBasell (LYB +3.8%) says it will begin talks to cease operations at its Berre, France...

    LyondellBasell (LYB +3.8%) says it will begin talks to cease operations at its Berre, France refinery, after its offer to sell the 105,000 bpd operation failed to attract any buyers.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:08 AM
  • TRQ

    Ivanhoe Mines (IVN +21.5%) is recouping all of yesterday's losses, and then some. After falling...

    Ivanhoe Mines (IVN +21.5%) is recouping all of yesterday's losses, and then some. After falling on fears of a larger Mongolian government stake in its Oyu Tolgoi project, shares are surging today on a Credit Suisse upgrade. The firm sees a larger government stake without compensation as "highly unlikely," and considers Ivanhoe undervalued regardless.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:08 AM
  • NDN

    99 Cents Only Stores (NYSE:NDN) falls 5% after DealReporter claims Apollo Global Management...

    99 Cents Only Stores (NYSE:NDN) falls 5% after DealReporter claims Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) may have ended its bidding efforts for the discount retailer. Investors have been hoping Apollo's offer would trump a $1.3B offer made in March to take 99 Cents private.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:59 AM | 1 Comment
  • HUN

    Shares of Huntsman (HUN) -2%) take a hit after Goldman Sachs drops the stock from its coveted...

    Shares of Huntsman (HUN) -2%) take a hit after Goldman Sachs drops the stock from its coveted Conviction Buy list and lowers earnings estimates. Analysts with the firm kept a Buy rating in place, but clipped the price target on shares to $16 from $14.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:55 AM
  • NEOG

    Neogen (NEOG -3.3%) FQ1 earnings missed across-the-board as revenue growth slowed and margins...

    Neogen (NEOG -3.3%) FQ1 earnings missed across-the-board as revenue growth slowed and margins dropped. Overall profits managed to eke out a 3.1% Y/Y gain, helped mainly by better international sales from its animal safety unit, but not enough to overcome higher net expenses.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:55 AM
  • RCM

    Accretive Health (AH +8.5%) pops after catching a Buy rating from UBS with a $29 price target on...

    Accretive Health (AH +8.5%) pops after catching a Buy rating from UBS with a $29 price target on the strength of the firm's ability to cash in on healthcare tailwinds.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:51 AM
  • AMZN

    Gdgt's Ryan Block follows up on yesterday's TechCrunch scoop on Amazon's (AMZN -1.7%) new tablet...

    Gdgt's Ryan Block follows up on yesterday's TechCrunch scoop on Amazon's (AMZN -1.7%) new tablet by adding Amazon's Kindle design team played no role in making the device, and that he's told the product is a "stopgap" rushed to market with the holiday season in mind. Amazon shares are noticeably underperforming the Nasdaq today.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:36 AM
  • UAL

    Airline stocks get skittish after oil futures jump 2.2% higher, and tail off after posting very...

    Airline stocks get skittish after oil futures jump 2.2% higher, and tail off after posting very early gains. Also, weighing on the sector is an EU carbon tax that an industry official likens to rules in the "colonial days." Decliners: UAL -2.1%, JBLU -1.4%, LCC -1.2%.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:35 AM
  • BB

    Research in Motion (RIMM +5.8%) shares spike higher on rumors Carl Icahn is building a stake.

    Research in Motion (RIMM +5.8%) shares spike higher on rumors Carl Icahn is building a stake.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:30 AM | 6 Comments
  • PQ

    It's a good day for oil companies, and an even better day for Petroquest Energy (NYSE:PQ) - up...

    It's a good day for oil companies, and an even better day for Petroquest Energy (NYSE:PQ) - up 13% on heavy trading volume. The firm started an acquisition and development kick in Oklahoma, adding to its exploration and production in three other states and the Gulf.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:26 AM
  • ATI

    Allegheny Tech (ATI +11.3%) spikes to the top of the S&P leader board after CNBC's Jim...

    Allegheny Tech (ATI +11.3%) spikes to the top of the S&P leader board after CNBC's Jim Cramer recommends the stock yesterday. Fresh European optimism also provides a boost for the rest of the steel sector: X +4.8%, WOR +7.2%, SCHN +8.7%.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:22 AM
  • RUSHA

    Shares of Rush Enterprises (RUSHA +1.4%) move higher after Morgan Keegan says the company will...

    Shares of Rush Enterprises (RUSHA +1.4%) move higher after Morgan Keegan says the company will benefit from high demand for heavy trucks. An analyst with the firm raised his rating to Outperform from Market Perform, calling for a multi-year swing in truck sales as the age of commercial trucks collectively nears its 15-year peak.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:17 AM
  • SU

    Oil stocks are outperforming today, thanks in large part to a sharp rebound in crude prices....

    Oil stocks are outperforming today, thanks in large part to a sharp rebound in crude prices. Some of the best performers: SU +6.3%. CNQ +5.7%. ECA +5.6%. NFX +5.6%. APC +4.7%. IMO +5.8%.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:10 AM
  • RLD

    Merriman's Eric Wold is bullish on 3-D and on RealD (RLD +14.2%) as the best way to invest...

    Merriman's Eric Wold is bullish on 3-D and on RealD (RLD +14.2%) as the best way to invest in the technology, "and the recurring license fee structure allows for continued growth along with consumer adoption." Noting the installation of 10,000 projection systems and $277M in revenue, Wold also sees RLD as a potential strategic acquisition or go-private candidate. (earlier)

     
     
     
     
    | 9:55 AM
  • SQNS

    Wireless chipmaker Sequans Communications (SQNS +22.5%) surges after announcing its TD-LTE 4G...

    Wireless chipmaker Sequans Communications (SQNS +22.5%) surges after announcing its TD-LTE 4G chips will be used in USB modem cards from Huawei Technologies, which in turn will be used on a TD-LTE trial network set up by China Mobile (NYSE:CHL), the world's largest carrier. China Mobile expects to roll out TD-LTE services next year.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:54 AM | 3 Comments
  • CVX

    Shares of Chevron (CVX +3.7%) come out of the gate charging, outpacing other Big Oil companies....

    Shares of Chevron (CVX +3.7%) come out of the gate charging, outpacing other Big Oil companies. The company's $28B plunge into developing a LNG project in Australia to tap the Asian energy market still has the eyes of investors and analysts.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:51 AM
  • WBA

    Walgreen (WAG) is down 1.9% after reporting FQ4 results. Investors could be upset over remarks...

    Walgreen (WAG) is down 1.9% after reporting FQ4 results. Investors could be upset over remarks about "no substantial progress" being made in Walgreen's contract renewal negotiations with Express Scripts (NASDAQ:ESRX). Walgreen announced in June it didn't expect to be part of Express Scripts' pharmacy provider network after this year.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:32 AM
  • JVA

    Coffee Holding Co. (NASDAQ:JVA) drops 9.1% premarket after announcing a $9.3M stock offering....

    Coffee Holding Co. (NASDAQ:JVA) drops 9.1% premarket after announcing a $9.3M stock offering. The offering will feature 890K shares at a purchase price of $10.40, below yesterday's closing price of $11.82, along with warrants to buy additional shares at $13.59. Company execs plan to sell up to 200K shares at $9.92 in a separate offering.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:19 AM | 2 Comments
  • A

    Premarket gainers: A +12%. SQNS +12%. YRCW +12%. BRD +7%. DB +7%. MCP +6%. MELA +6%. ING +6%. SD...

    Premarket gainers: A +12%. SQNS +12%. YRCW +12%. BRD +7%. DB +7%. MCP +6%. MELA +6%. ING +6%. SD +5%. CTIC +5%. TCK +5%. CS +5%. SLW +5%. CEF +5%. ARMH +4%. EK +5%. GSS +5%. FCX +4%. NBG +4%. STM +4%. HAL +3%. YOKU +3%. SINA +3%. AU +3%. BCS +3%. AKS +3%. MT +3%. AUY +3%. LVS +3%. MOS +3%.
    Losers: WAG -3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:00 AM
  • COP

    ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) announces it's seeking a buyer for a refinery in Pennsylvania and...

    ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) announces it's seeking a buyer for a refinery in Pennsylvania and related pipelines and terminals. Shares are up 2.4% premarket, slightly ahead of Big Oil rivals.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:59 AM

    Shares of Starbucks (NASDAQ:SBUX) are making a premarket move, up 2.3%, as investors start to...
